meanings.sent1: The tiny bug was unperceived by the busy gardener.
meanings.sent2: The unperceived mistake in the document went unnoticed.
meanings.sent3: The unperceived banana peel on the floor caused a hilarious slip.
meanings.sent4: Her unperceived talent for painting finally came to light.
meanings.sent5: The unperceived shadow in the corner startled the child.

meanings.sent1: The unperceived scent of fresh flowers lingered in the room.
meanings.sent2: The unperceived sound of footsteps made her uneasy.
meanings.sent3: The unperceived taste of the new dish surprised him.
meanings.sent4: His unperceived touch on her shoulder made her jump.
meanings.sent5: The unperceived warmth of the sun on her face was comforting.
